docs.snippet: LEHRMAN--Seymour, 98, passed away July 3, 2015. His wife Lucille Hecht left us in 1999. He leaves eight nieces and nephews - Marcia and Nancy Dunetz, Shoshanah Devorah, Judith and David Fleiss, Richard, Kenneth and Donald Lewis. Donations in his m...
docs.lead_paragraph:
LEHRMAN--Seymour, 98, passed away July 3, 2015. His wife Lucille Hecht left us in 1999. He leaves eight nieces and nephews - Marcia and Nancy Dunetz, Shoshanah Devorah, Judith and David Fleiss, Richard, Kenneth and Donald Lewis. Donations in his memory would be appreciated to the Wounded Warrior Project www.woundedwa

rriorproject.org, The Broadway Bach Ensemble www.broadwaybach.org or any charity you choose.

headline.main: Judge: Meeting on Sex Offender Program Will Stay Private
headline.print_headline: Judge: Meeting on Sex Offender Program Will Stay Private

docs.snippet: A federal judge on Friday denied a media request to open up a meeting where top Minnesota leaders are expected to discuss ways to fix the state's civil commitment program for sex offenders....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Friday denied a media request to open up a meeting where top Minnesota leaders are expected to discuss ways to fix the state's civil commitment program for sex offenders.

headline.main: Officials: Mom Who Lost Custody Kills Kids' Services Worker
headline.print_headline: Officials: Mom Who Lost Custody Kills Kids' Services Worker

docs.snippet: A woman who was upset about losing custody of her daughter used a hunting rifle to fatally shoot a child-welfare agency worker who had handled her case, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who was upset about losing custody of her daughter used a hunting rifle to fatally shoot a child-welfare agency worker who had handled her case, authorities said.

headline.main: Texas Police Fatally Shoot Unarmed College Football Player
headline.print_headline: Texas Police Fatally Shoot Unarmed College Football Player

docs.snippet: A police officer in suburban Dallas shot and killed a college football player during a struggle after the unarmed 19-year-old crashed a car through the front window of a car dealership, authorities said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A police officer in suburban Dallas shot and killed a college football player during a struggle after the unarmed 19-year-old crashed a car through the front window of a car dealership, authorities said Friday.

headline.main: Reaction to Death of LPGA Founding Player Louise Suggs
headline.print_headline: Reaction to Death of LPGA Founding Player Louise Suggs

docs.snippet: Louise Suggs, an LPGA founder and among the best women to ever play with 61 wins and 11 majors, died Friday at age 91....
docs.lead_paragraph: Louise Suggs, an LPGA founder and among the best women to ever play with 61 wins and 11 majors, died Friday at age 91.

headline.main: Firestone a Very Different Challenge for Lowry Six Years On
headline.print_headline: Firestone a Very Different Challenge for Lowry Six Years On

docs.snippet: Six years after struggling in his first appearance at the WGC-Bridgestone Invitational, Ireland's Shane Lowry has gained length off the tee and now views the hosting Firestone Country Club in a very different light....
docs.lead_paragraph: Six years after struggling in his first appearance at the WGC-Bridgestone Invitational, Ireland's Shane Lowry has gained length off the tee and now views the hosting Firestone Country Club in a very different light.

headline.main: Cilic and Nishikori Set for U.S. Open Rematch
headline.print_headline: Cilic and Nishikori Set for U.S. Open Rematch

docs.snippet: Marin Cilic and Kei Nishikori will meet in the semi-finals at the Citi Open in Washington on Saturday, their first encounter since the final of last year's U.S. Open....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marin Cilic and Kei Nishikori will meet in the semi-finals at the Citi Open in Washington on Saturday, their first encounter since the final of last year's U.S. Open.

headline.main: Wrongful Death Allegation Filed Against Bobbi Kristina Brown Boyfriend: Report
headline.print_headline: Wrongful Death Allegation Filed Against Bobbi Kristina Brown Boyfriend: Report

docs.snippet: The conservator of the late Bobbi Kristina Brown, the daughter of singer Whitney Houston who died in July after months in a coma, has added a wrongful death accusation to a lawsuit against Brown's boyfriend, an Atlanta television station said Frid...
docs.lead_paragraph: The conservator of the late Bobbi Kristina Brown, the daughter of singer Whitney Houston who died in July after months in a coma, has added a wrongful death accusation to a lawsuit against Brown's boyfriend, an Atlanta television station said Friday.

headline.main: Schwarber Continues Surge, Cubs Beat Giants 7-3
headline.print_headline: Schwarber Continues Surge, Cubs Beat Giants 7-3

docs.snippet: Rookie Kyle Schwarber continued his surge with two hits and two RBIs to back Jon Lester, and the Chicago Cubs beat the San Francisco Giants 7-3 for their eighth win in nine games Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rookie Kyle Schwarber continued his surge with two hits and two RBIs to back Jon Lester, and the Chicago Cubs beat the San Francisco Giants 7-3 for their eighth win in nine games Friday.

headline.main: Dodgers Ace Kershaw's Scoreless Streak Ends at 37 Innings
headline.print_headline: Dodgers Ace Kershaw's Scoreless Streak Ends at 37 Innings

docs.snippet: Clayton Kershaw's streak of 37 consecutive scoreless innings ended Friday night when the Los Angeles Dodgers ace gave up a leadoff homer to Pittsburgh's Gregory Polanco....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clayton Kershaw's streak of 37 consecutive scoreless innings ended Friday night when the Los Angeles Dodgers ace gave up a leadoff homer to Pittsburgh's Gregory Polanco.
